name: thingengine-core
description: The core runtime system of the Almond virtual assistant
author: Stanford University Mobile and Social Computing Lab

scripts.update-po: for i in po/*.po ; do msgmerge -U $i po/${npm_package_name}.pot ; done
scripts.compile-mo: for i in po/*.po ; do msgfmt $i -o po/`basename $i .po`.mo ; done
scripts.compile-builtins: for i in data/*.tt ; do node -e 'console.log(JSON.stringify(require("fs").readFileSync("'${i}'").toString("utf8")))' > lib/devices/builtins/$(basename $i).json ; done
scripts.prepare: which yarn >/dev/null 2>&1 && ( yarn compile-mo && yarn compile-builtins ) || ( npm run compile-mo && npm run compile-builtins )
